originalText.text:
About 1 year ago I had done Smile Direct Club which I regret doing as it made my teeth and TMJ worse. I was in a desperate search of a GOOD orthodontist and one of my co-workers told me about Dr. Yoon.

I went in for a consult and he explained EVERYTHING in detail including my TMJ issues. It wasn‚Äôt as cheap as Smile Direct Club but I decide to go with an ACTUAL orthodontist this time (instead of doing it myself). Last week, I finally started my Invisalign treatment along with some Botox injection for my grinding at night. My jaws are not stiff any more in the morning and I am now pain FREE! I have to say Invisalign is not easy as I need to keep them in at ALL times and cut down on snacking but I know it‚Äôs so MUCH BETTER than having braces (again). I cannot wait to have a nice HEALTHY smile! Highly recommend Dr. Yoon for anyone who‚Äôs considering a REAL orthodontist in NYC.

originalText.text: My dentist highly recommended Dr. Yoon so I went in for my consult. I was quite impressed by how thoroughly he explained everything to me. They use this digital teeth scanner to show me my outcome which was really cool. Highly recommend Dr. Yoon if you are looking for an orthodontist!!

text.text: My dentist highly recommended Dr. Yoon so I went in for my consult. I was quite impressed by how thoroughly he explained everything to me. They use this digital teeth scanner to show me my outcome which was really cool. Highly recommend Dr. Yoon if you are looking for an orthodontist!!

originalText.text: I have an 8-year old daughter and her pediatric dentist had recommended us to go see Dr. Yoon. I really didn‚Äôt think she would need braces at this young age but we took her there just to be safe. Dr. Yoon said her jaws were too narrow and she might have problems with her adult teeth growing in down the road. I had no idea how narrow her jaws were until he showed how small they were! So we decided to start the treatment with Dr. Yoon. She got an expander first and then started Invisalign recently (I didn‚Äôt know the Invisalign also works for young children). My daughter‚Äôs teeth look really good already and also she really likes her Invisalign. I‚Äôm just glad that we took her to Dr. Yoon and followed his recommendation for my little girl! We also got this cute eco bag üòç

originalText.text: If you are looking for the best orthodontist in NYC, look no further! Dr. Yoon is absolutely knowledgeable and professional, always answering my (never-ending) questions! I decided to get clear braces instead of Invisalign after he explained all the pros/cons for each option. I'm glad I went with braces:-) thank you Dr.Yoon!
